title: Event-loop thread blocked when connecting to an unavailable OIDC server

### Expected behavior

Connecting to an unavailable server does not result in a blocked Thread.

### Actual behavior

2-3 VertxException for blocked event-loop threads are occuring in the logs at application startup.

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer: https://github.com/siewp/keycloak-issue-reproducer
You can just follow the Readme of the project to reproduce.

Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Configure an oidc auth server which is not available in the application.properties
2. Build the project as a docker container
3. Run the docker container
